data.text:
Challenge Conventional

Wisdom™

Without risk, there is no gain. It is a series of risks that got Tiffin University to where it is today —and it is risk that will continue to propel Tiffin University forward.

Welcome Weekend

Welcome Weekend is a two-day event full of exciting activities for new and returning students to help kick-off the year. For new first-year and transfer students, the weekend serves as an introduction to virtually everything TU has to offer and the adjustment to college expectations.

See the Agenda

Find Your Program

Explore our majors in arts and sciences, business and criminal justice.

View Majors

Explore Campus

Find out what it’s like to be a Dragon with our Episode of The College Tour

Watch Now

This isn’t just another college.

Tiffin University is a crossroads: we represent who you are now and who you will become. Not only will you find yourself, you will create your best you. TU is a private university with costs comparable or less than many public universities. We offer undergraduate, graduate and doctoral programs; on-campus and fully online programs. Our students are diverse, representing all 50 states, 37 countries, and they get the attention they deserve. We have a 20:1 student-faculty ratio, with an average of 20 students in a class.

Why Choose Tiffin University?
